text: shri lanka dumriya departhamenthuwa wisin pasugiyada siya departhamenthuwata dumriya dhawana madiri aanayanaya kaleya.
dilruwan perera kadulu hatharak dawagaththa.

manda mema aagamhi shasthruwarun kisiweku...
ma me sitinne kohida yanna pawa mata sitha ganimata bari wiya.hotalaye kamaraye nam manjeshwari ma asala sitiya yuthu ya.

bhumiye sidukarana meheyum wala anadenna wiya.mema meheyuma sidukirimata pera guwan niyamuwan rathrikalaye aadharaka nomathiwa guwanyana godabassawima ha nawatha guwan gatha kirima pilibadawada puhunuwim sidu kaleya.
”me widiyata mage jiwithaye ithiri kalaya palama diha balagena sathutin inna labunoth mata ee athi.”

pap padawiyehi purappaduwak athiwimen sathi deka thunakata pasuwa kadinalwarun ekraswa, abhinawa papwahanse thora pathkara ganima methek anugamanaya keruna charithraya wu namuth nawa regulasi yatathe lowa pura sitina kadinalwarun romayata ras wuna wahama abhinawa pap wahanse thora pathkara ganimata awasthawa udaweyi.
sasapa pradhana lekam wije dayas anusmaranata sahabhagiwuwan amathayi kirthige abhawaya hatharawana jathyantharaye jathyanthara kamituwatath ehi shri lanka shakhawatath pirimasiya nohaki paduwaki.
ewani naluwan bihiweyida ?
wisheshayen jathyanthara deshapalanaye swabhawaya handunaganimedi hobsge adahas nawa arthakathanayana badun karamin bhawitha we.
1993 wasare di mumbayi nuwarata ella wu bomba praharawalata sambandha wu dedenekuta...

janel kawuewen piyambaa gos maranaya walandaganimin aya kiya sitinne purushadhipathyaye rahanen sthrin pelana, aneka ge aathmaya handuna noganna, ekineka gen wenas wana nisa ma agathigami wa salakana, ekinekage suwapathwima wenuwen peni nositinna wu mema samajaya wenas kirimen thora wa sashrika manushika sabandatha athi karagatha nohaki bawa yi; me karana niruwath samajayak idiriye thabime aramunen akamathen wuwath ayata melowa athahara yannata siduwa athi bawa yi.
ema meheware nayakathwaya daruwe 1974-1984 kalaya thula (eka pita eka) dhura kala hatharak ehi mahalekam thanathura daru koreyayi.

me suddan thamunge gamana ena athara magadi igena gaththu shilpa kramath ekka happenda, gema illanda ee wenakota indiyawe hitapu swadeshikayanta puluwan une na.

maghage bala pradesha sithiyamgatha karala salasum sakas karanawa.
me wana wita pradeshaye samakami wathawaranayak pawathina bawa hethema kiya sitiyi.
ee nisa mata tika kalayajak denna ikmanatama kathawa dannam.
mata hithenawa ma thula pita sakwala jiwiyek wadenawa kiyala.api aadharaka sapayanawa.
deshapalanayata yuddhaya aaropanaya kirimath, aluth awi tharagayak tharam.
ee anuwa aanduwa kal marana bawath janathawata pitikiri bhawithaya sambandhayen wisandumak nathi bawath owun penwadena ladi.
ethanadi mama waradiyi.
pasugiya da ‘sande tayims’ puwathpatha wartha kala paridi, banku wanchawak sambandhayen pa්rashna kirimata amarikawata me pudgalayawa awashya kota thibe.

nithipathi departhamenthuwa wisin adhikaranayata danwa athi paridi parpechuwel tresharis samagama awastha kihipayakadi mendis arakku samagama sathu paudgalika banku ginumaka rupiyal koti 119 k thanpath kara athayida wasantha samarasinha mahatha janadhipathiwarayata danum demin kiya siti.
esenam thewani asa mese kiyami.

jathika watup prathipaththiya ullanghanaya karamin nithipathi departhamenthuwa, adhikarana sewa departhamenthuwa saha nithi kshethrayanhi watup 300% kin ihala damimata katayuthu kara athi athara ee thulin rajya sewaya thula dawantha gatalu rasak athiwi thibena bawa dipa wyaptha sewa widhayaka niladharinge eekabaddha kamituwa awadharanaya kara sitiyi.
me athara anuradhapura disthrikkaye thoragath gowibim akkara 75000 ka badairigu waga kirima aarambha kara thibenawa.
eheth ohuge sadacharaya, ohuge paripurnathwaya gana soya balana wadasatahan nathi ganana ya.
wada karanakota mata lokema amathaka wenawa.eeka hariyata dahangatha wimak wage.
age katahande wuye tharamaka nurussana swarupayak bawa mata hangina.
pirimi gana nam oba dana ganna athine obage anthima satahanen.
mema purudu 7 thibena pirimiyeku kisida wiwaha kara noganna.
thawa thawath yahapath de wadagath de obe blogaye palakarathwa.
pilimaya pamula alankara padmasanayak athi athara, padmasanaye sita siras pathata athi mulu usa adi 46 angal 4 k lesa ganan bala atha.

wadima awadhanayak sahitha kala parasaya thula adhika milak sahitha rupawahini danwim palakaramin osteraliyawata bottuwalin noena lesa osteraliyanu rajaya ape minissunta awawada karanu wili lachja nathiwa asan innata apata siduwiya.
ewita kisiwekuta sahasika lesa sahal welenda polehi gela mirikimata no haki wanu aththe ya.
me pilibanda chodana eddi pasugiya aanduwe adhyapana amathi bandula gunawardhana parlimenthuwe di kiwwa ”pasalwalin mudal aya karanne naha.
kakul deke minissu una apith anungen pihita pathaddi thamange swahawayata pitin ginin kakul dekin hita ganna eka kochchara loku deyakda?

pura ata wasarak thisse thaleyimannarama pa්radhana widiye sthanagatha kara thibu polis wishesha karya balaka kandawura nowumbar masa palamuwanida sita ema sthanayen iwath kara atha.mema kadawura ema sthanayen waha iwath karannayi demala jathika sandhanaya pasugiya kalaya purama wirodhatha gananawak pawathwuha.kandawura iwath kirimen pasu ehi athireka gabadawa wawniyawe kurukkalpudukulama wishesha karya balaka kandawurata yomu kara atha.

deliniwus paththaraye siti katun shilpi kolatge apahasayata ethuma lakwuye modayek nikamek (bhasabajadapachadadacha) yana nama patabandimeni. 1944 juni 27 wanida deliniwus paththaraya kiya sitiye, ethuma siya bala kshethraya ikmawa katayuthu kirimata uthsaha darana bawayi.

mulu senangada: aamen kiya swaminwahanse warnanakaloya. 37ikbithi swaminwahansege giwisum pettiya idiriyehi nitharama eka eka dawasata sudusu lesa sewayakirimata ohu pettiya idiriyehi aasapda ohuge sahodarayanda, 38oobed-eedom saha owunge sahodarayan hata ata denekda sitewuweya; yeduthunge puthrawu oobed-eedomda hosada doratupalayan kota niyamakeleya. 39swaminwahanse ishrayelta anakalawu unwahansege wyawasthawehi liya thibena siyalla prakarayata, dawana puja pudana pujasanaya pita dawana puja nitharama udaya sawasa swaminwahanseta oppukarana pinisa, 40pujakawu shadokda pujakayanwu ohuge sahodarayanda, gibiyonhi usthana thibena swaminwahansege mandapaya idiriyehi sitinta niyamakeleya. 41owun samanga hemanda yeduthunda nam sandahankara thoraganu labu anik ayada: swaminwahansege karunawa sadakalayatama pawathneya kiya unwahanseta sthuthikirimata niyamakeleya. 42owun samanga hemanda yeduthunda niyamakaranu labuye nalawalinuth aththalwalinuth dewiyanwahanseta githika sandaha thurya bhandawalinuth shabdakirimataya.

ragar kridaka wasim thajudinge ghathanaya sambandhayen awashya karunu kihipayak sambandayen rahas polisiya rathawahana anshaye niyojya polispathi amarasiri senarathna mahathagen ada (04) ude prashna kirima arambau bawa polis aaranchi marga sandahan karayi.
